name: 0 - Outro
_source: speak;Emily; What the hell were those?!{w} Those weren't regular monsters!
speak;Lily; Emma, are you going to be OK?
speak;Caroline; Girls, I managed to find a few of your things in the rubble of your mother's house{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I think you're going to want them.
speak;Emily; Come on, Emma, let's take these and kill whoever sent these things to our town.
speak;Emily; Argh!{w} Say something!{w} Don't just stand there!{w} Our town is a pile of ashes and bodies!
speak;Caroline; Hey, gals, let's leave my daughters alone for a minute.{w} We've got some things to talk about of our own{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Have either of you seen Sonia?{w} I lost track of her in the chaos,{w} wanted to make sure her wounds weren't too grave.
speak;Caroline; Lily, Marica, what's happened to Sonia?
speak;Lily; When we found here{tgm}...{tgm}{w} This was all that was left intact{tgm}...
speak;Marica; I{tgm}...{tgm}{c:wait;300} Those{tgm}...{tgm}{w} What the hell spurred those monsters to come to our village and{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Looking at them up close,{w} I'm certain they could only have come straight from the demon army.{w} These have to be their soldiers.
speak;Lily; What? The demon army?{w} But we haven't heard any news like that from nearby towns.{w} A messenger surely would've come to warn us beforehand, right?
speak;Marica; First the army can bring the dead to life to fight for them,{w} and now they can take us completely by surprise.{w} I don't like the sound of this{tgm}...
speak;Lily; Should we tell the girls about the whole situation?{w} Hiding it from them after this ordeal doesn't seem practical.
speak;Caroline; I don't think there's any use keeping the army secret after this{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The least we can do is answer some of their questions.
speak;Lily; I'll take Marica to try and see what's left in town we can use.{w} And{tgm}...{tgm}to say goodbye.
speak;Caroline; Take your time.{w} My talk with the girls might not be a quick one{tgm}...
speak;Marica; We should be quick and leave soon though{tgm}...
speak;Marica; I don't like the idea of more demons coming to replace their fallen friends.
speak;Sonia; Thank the stars, you and the girls are fine.
speak;Caroline; We may not be too worse for wear, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The girls had a small fight and aren't speaking right now{tgm}...
speak;Sonia; Hah, well, I'm not worried about them.{w} Those kids will make up.{w} But Caroline{tgm}...{tgm}{w} What were those undead things?
speak;Caroline; Looking at them up close,{w} I'm certain these ugly corpses came straight from the demon army.{w} These have to be their soldiers.
speak;Lily; What? The demon army?{w} But we haven't heard any news like that from nearby towns.{w} A messenger surely would've come to warn us beforehand, right?
speak;Marica; First the army can bring the dead to life to fight for them,{w} and now they can take us completely by surprise.{w} I don't like the sound of this{tgm}...
speak;Sonia; So we'll tell the girls about the demons, right, Caroline?
speak;Caroline; I don't think there's any use keeping the army secret after this{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The least we can do is answer some of their questions.
speak;Sonia; Listen, we need to move out to the other village nearby and warn them.{w} You go have that talk while the rest of us try to gather more supplies.
speak;Caroline; That sounds like a good idea to me.
speak;Marica; We should be quick and leave soon enough{tgm}...
speak;Marica; I don't like the idea of more demons coming to replace their fallen friends.
speak;Emily; We need your help burying the dead.
speak;Emma; I just can't accept that these things destroyed my hometown.{w} Before we left, everyone was just having a normal, fun day, but now{tgm}...
speak;Emily; I get that you may not be all there, but-
speak;Caroline; Emma, Emily, how are you holding up?
speak;Emma; I just{tgm}...{tgm} need some time{tgm}...
speak;Emily; I'm going to find whoever did this and burn <bconvo>their</> town down!{w} Who was behind all of this?{w} Who do I need to shoot an arrow through?{w} Tell me!
speak;Caroline; I can't say for sure, but these things look like they came from the demon army.
speak;Emma; T-The demon army?{w} You mean Wrisiam soldiers?{w} But{tgm}...{tgm}why are they attacking us?{w} We didn't do anything to anyone!
speak;Emily; Hmph, I don't care why they're doing anything.{w} I'm going to march to Wrisiam,{w} and I'm going to put arrows through the hearts of their damn royals!

speak;Caroline; Emily!{w} Control yourself!{w} You're not going to march to your death.{w} My guess is that they're attacking other parts of this region as well,{w} so we should focus on helping the others if we can.
speak;Emma; It's just unfair.{w} We were so happy.{w} We were living in peace,{w} without any trouble.{w} Now it looks like we'll be caught up in a war{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; I know you don't want to abandon your only home, but it's not safe here anymore.{w} We're going to my old hideout, and from there, we can figure out what's going on.
speak;Caroline; Emily?{w} Is there something else you wanted to say?
speak;Emily; I can't believe that the first time you're actually taking us outside the village,{w} it's under these circumstances{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Say your goodbyes to the town, girls.
